biotools.summary: Preprocess ChIP-seq aligned reads before calling FindPeaks: Filter out dulpicates from the SAMPLE (optional) and create a CONTROL dataset w/o duplicates with the same number of reads as in the SAMPLE. Only eland, sam and bam files are accepted.

bioschemas.name: createcontrolsubset
bioschemas.summary: Preprocess ChIP-seq aligned reads before calling FindPeaks: Filter out dulpicates from the SAMPLE (optional) and create a CONTROL dataset w/o duplicates with the same number of reads as in the SAMPLE. Only eland, sam and bam files are accepted.
